Hero.info: Welcome to the Smart Path to Future Collaboration and Growth

title.0: Welcome to the Smart Path to Future Collaboration and Growth

description.0: Reach partners across the EU at no cost with just a few clicks.
description.1: We are a digital platform that connects moving, transport, and service companies to enable efficient collaboration, smart growth, and sustainable development.
description.2: A platform for task sharing that unites moving, transport, and service companies across Sweden and EU countries.
description.3: We contribute to sustainability by reducing the number of vehicles on the road through coordinated sharing of transport and service tasks between companies.

whyWe.title1Info: Connect to a digital platform with all your partners
whyWe.title2Info: Fill your schedule efficiently with assignments
whyWe.title3Info: Contribute to reduced environmental impact through ride-sharing and resource-sharing

About.AboutInfo: Max To Go is a digital platform that connects moving, transport, and service companies across Sweden and the EU. We streamline booking and task sharing within transport and logistics to maximize efficiency and customer comfort. By coordinating transport assignments, we help companies manage operations and ensure safe transport, creating smoother workflows and optimizing resources. In doing so, we also make a positive contribution to sustainability by reducing the number of vehicles on the road.
About.welcome: Welcome to the Smart Path to Future Collaboration and Growth
About.mainDescription: Transforming relocations into seamless experiences with professional expertise and dedication
About.intro: Max To Go is an innovative platform connecting companies in the transport, moving, construction, and other service industries to streamline operations and create smart, sustainable solutions. Through Max To Go, companies can not only sell and buy assignments from one another but also optimize resources, reduce empty trips, and unlock new business opportunities.

collaboration.title: Examples of Collaboration: Moving and Transport Companies
collaboration.description: In the moving and transport industry, empty trips are common—when a vehicle returns without cargo after a delivery or move. Max To Go allows moving and transport companies to sell these empty trips to other businesses that need transportation from the same area.

benefits.title: Max To Go – Benefits for All Industries
benefits.costs: Reduced Costs: Companies avoid unnecessary empty trips, saving fuel and time.
benefits.revenue: Increased Revenue: By selling empty trips, companies can fill their vehicles on return journeys and generate additional income.
benefits.utilization: Better Resource Utilization: By coordinating trips between companies, vehicle capacity is maximized for every transport.
benefits.reduced: Reduced Empty Trips: By buying and selling empty trips from other companies, transporters can make full use of each journey.
benefits.maximized: Maximized Revenue: Companies can sell extra assignments and purchase assignments from others to fill schedules.
benefits.improved: Improved Cross-Industry Collaboration: Max To Go provides a platform where companies from various sectors can connect.
benefits.sustainable: Sustainable Growth: By optimizing trips and reducing empty journeys, we contribute to a more sustainable future.

industries.title: Examples of Collaboration in Other Industries

construction.title: Construction and Transport Companies
construction.description: Construction companies can easily book material transport from various suppliers directly through the app, coordinating multiple deliveries along the same route.

service.title: Service Companies
service.description: Companies in sectors like plumbing, electrical work, and cleaning can use Max To Go to coordinate their services with moving and transport companies.

retail.title: Retail and Logistics
retail.description: Stores and warehouses can use Max To Go to sell their transport needs to local transport companies, enabling faster and more cost-effective deliveries.

About.closing: Max To Go is the future platform for companies in transport, moving, construction, and other service industries that aim to collaborate smarter and grow sustainably.

Services.ServicesIntro: Discover our comprehensive range of services designed to streamline your logistics and moving needs
Services.Service1: Sell and Buy Moving and Logistics Tasks
Services.Service1Info: Connect with other moving companies and transport businesses to sell and buy assignments. Whether you offer moving services or logistics solutions, you can easily transfer tasks and maximize your business opportunities.
Services.Service2Info: Maximize your resource utilization by selling your empty runs between cities or countries. Use our platform to easily register available runs and connect with other transport companies that need to transport goods in the same direction. This contributes to sustainability by reducing the number of empty vehicles on the roads.
Services.Service3Info: Offer your services in moving cleaning, facility maintenance, and other service areas. By using our platform, companies can easily buy and sell services, creating an efficient and secure workflow.
Services.Service4Info: Need to temporarily store goods? Our platform enables the buying and selling of storage services, making it easier for businesses to manage their resources and inventory.
Services.Service5Info: Take advantage of ride-sharing opportunities with other businesses. By collaborating, you can share transportation costs and optimize your logistics, improving operational management and enhancing customer comfort.
Services.Service6Info: Do you have a truck available on a certain day? Register your vehicle on our platform so that other companies can book it for their transportation needs. This creates a flexible and safe transport solution for everyone involved.

HowItWorks.title: This is how Max To Go works, via our app or website:

step1.title: You have a task to sell
step1.description: If you have a task, for example in the moving or another industry, that you cannot take on or want to sell to others, you can easily do so through Max To Go, either via our app or website.

step2.title: Log in and describe the task
step2.description: Log in via our app or website, describe the task in detail (e.g., a move from one location to another, delivery of construction materials, or a service), and publish it. The more information you provide, the clearer it will be for potential buyers.

step3.title: Other companies see your task
step3.description: All companies using Max To Go, whether via the app or website, will see the task in their feed. They can either buy the task directly or place bids if you choose to accept offers.

step4.title: Choose a buyer
step4.description: Once several companies have shown interest, you can choose the one you think is best suited to take on the task – either based on price, experience, or reviews from previous collaborations.

step5.title: Evaluate the buyer
step5.description: After the task is completed, you can evaluate the buyer and their service. This helps other companies on the platform make informed decisions about whom to collaborate with in the future.

HowItWorks.closing: Max To Go, through both the app and the website, makes it easy for companies to collaborate, sell and buy tasks, and contribute to a smooth and efficient workflow.

Contact.ContactInfo: add your information to contact you as soon as possible

FAQs.title: FAQs for Max To Go
FAQs.a1: Max To Go is a digital platform that connects transport, moving, and service companies to streamline operations and facilitate collaboration.
FAQs.q2: How does Max To Go work?
FAQs.a2: Users can register, post tasks, and either buy or sell services such as transport, moving, and logistics through the platform.
FAQs.q3: Who can use Max To Go?
FAQs.a3: Any company in the transport, moving, or service industry can register and use the platform.
FAQs.q4: How do I create an account?
FAQs.a4: You can create an account by visiting our website and following the registration process, which involves providing some basic information about your company.
FAQs.q5: Is there a fee to use Max To Go?
FAQs.a5: Registration is free, but there may be fees associated with specific transactions or services on the platform.
FAQs.q6: How do I post a task?
FAQs.a6: Once you're logged in, navigate to the task posting section, provide detailed information about the task, and submit it for other users to see.
FAQs.q7: Can I sell my empty trips?
FAQs.a7: Yes, you can list your empty trips on the platform for other companies to purchase, maximizing your vehicle's utilization.
FAQs.q8: How can I find other companies to collaborate with?
FAQs.a8: You can browse the platform to find companies that offer services complementary to your own and contact them directly through the app.
FAQs.q9: What types of tasks can I post?
FAQs.a9: You can post tasks related to transport, moving, logistics, and even service jobs like cleaning and maintenance.
FAQs.q10: How do payments work on Max To Go?
FAQs.a10: Payments are arranged directly between the buyer and seller outside of the app; Max To Go does not handle transactions.
FAQs.q11: What if I have a problem with a task or a company?
FAQs.a11: You can contact us at info@movinggomax.com for assistance with any issues or disputes.
FAQs.q12: Is my data safe with Max To Go?
FAQs.a12: Yes, we comply with GDPR regulations and take the necessary steps to protect your personal and company data.
FAQs.q13: How does Max To Go contribute to sustainability?
FAQs.a13: By facilitating collaboration and resource sharing, Max To Go helps reduce empty trips, which minimizes fuel consumption and environmental impact.
FAQs.q14: Can I use the platform for international tasks?
FAQs.a14: Yes, Max To Go allows for connections not just within Sweden but also across EU countries.
FAQs.q15: What types of companies can benefit from Max To Go?
FAQs.a15: Transport companies, moving firms, construction companies, and service providers can all benefit from increased collaboration and efficiency.
FAQs.q16: How do I remove a posted task?
FAQs.a16: To remove a task, simply contact us at info@movinggomax.com, and we will assist you in deleting it from the platform.
FAQs.q17: Are there any restrictions on who I can sell tasks to?
FAQs.a17: No, you can sell tasks to any registered user on the platform as long as they meet the requirements for the service you're offering.
FAQs.q18: What happens if a company doesn't fulfill a task?
FAQs.a18: We recommend addressing the issue directly with the company involved, but you can also report it to us for further review.
FAQs.q19: Can I access Max To Go from my mobile device?
FAQs.a19: Yes, Max To Go is designed to be accessible from both desktop and mobile devices for your convenience.
FAQs.q20: How do I contact Max To Go for support?
FAQs.a20: You can reach us via email at info@movinggomax.com for any inquiries or support requests.

Terms.title: Terms of Use for Max To Go

terms.title: Terms for Using Max To Go

content.1: By using Max To Go, you agree to the current terms of use.
Max To Go is a platform that connects transport, moving, and service companies to streamline logistics, transport, and booking tasks.
content.2: By registering and describing tasks on Max To Go, companies can buy and sell services such as transport, moving, and logistics, as well as manage available resources to maximize capacity.
content.3: When a task is published, other companies within the network can buy or place a bid, enabling a secure and efficient transfer of tasks.
content.4: Max To Go will send an email confirmation for each completed task transaction. Contact is made directly between the user and the purchasing company.
content.5: If users wish to remove a request or a published task from the platform, they can contact us at: info@movinggomax.com.

content.1: Misrepresenting an association with Max To Go or our partners, either publicly or privately, is prohibited.
content.2: Unauthorized access to non-public parts of the platform or information from other users is not allowed.
content.3: Max To Go must not be used to distribute malicious code or to gather hidden information from other users.
content.4: Users must not interfere with other users' ability to use the platform.
content.5: Impersonating another person or entity is prohibited.
content.6: If there is suspected misuse of the platform, Max To Go reserves the right to suspend the account.

content.1: Max To Go facilitates contact between users and providers and is not involved in the execution or content of the agreements made between parties.
content.2: Transport companies, moving companies, and service companies on Max To Go are independent, and we do not guarantee that all providers will contact users with offers.
content.3: The use of Max To Go is at the user's own risk, and Max To Go is not responsible for the execution or quality of agreements. However, we only work with reliable and reputable companies.
content.4: Max To Go partners with selected independent companies but does not guarantee that the offers are the best or cheapest on the market.
content.5: Max To Go is not responsible for force majeure events such as natural disasters, strikes, import restrictions, or other unforeseen events impacting our platform.
content.6: Max To Go is not responsible for any taxes or fees related to the use of the platform.

content.1: All intellectual property rights related to Max To Go belong to Max To Go and may not be used commercially without written permission.
All communication with Max To Go is conducted electronically via info@movinggomax.com.
Max To Go complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), and collected data is used solely for the purpose of connecting relevant transport and service companies.
Max To Go reserves the right to change the terms of use without prior notice. Continued use implies acceptance of the new terms.
content.2: The date of the latest update is shown at the top of this document.

content.1: Use of Max To Go and any disputes are subject to Swedish law.
content.2: Disputes should primarily be resolved directly between the parties but may be taken to court if necessary.

Auth.PleaseReadTerms: Please read the terms of use carefully before using Max To Go.

AboutS.Introduction: MovingGo Max is a revolutionary platform that unites companies in transport, moving, construction, and other service industries under one roof. Our app is designed to promote collaboration between companies, streamline their operations, and create smart, sustainable solutions for growth.
AboutS.CollaborationIntro: Through MovingGo Max, companies from different industries can easily interact, sell tasks to each other, and optimize their resources – all via a centralized and user-friendly platform.

Benefits.Title: Benefits of MovingGo Max:
Benefits.Point1: Maximum efficiency: By coordinating services and selling tasks to each other, companies can reduce empty runs, increase productivity, and maximize their resources.
Benefits.Point2: Cross-industry collaboration: MovingGo Max enables companies from different sectors to connect and collaborate in ways that weren't previously possible.
Benefits.Point3: Sustainable growth: By reducing the number of vehicles on the roads and optimizing resource usage, companies can grow sustainably while contributing to a greener future.

HowItWorks.Title: This is how MovingGo Max works, via our app or website:
HowItWorks.Step1: You have a task to sell: If you have a task, for example in the moving industry or any other industry, that you cannot take on or want to sell forward, you can easily do so through MovingGo Max, either via our app or website.
HowItWorks.Step2: Log in and describe the task: Log in via our app or website, describe the task in detail (e.g., moving from one location to another, delivery of construction materials, or a service), and publish it. The more information you provide, the clearer it becomes for potential buyers.
HowItWorks.Step3: Other companies see your task: All companies using MovingGo Max, via the app or website, receive the task in their feed. They can either buy the task directly or place bids if you choose to accept offers.
HowItWorks.Step4: Choose a buyer: When several companies have shown interest, you can choose the company you think is best suited to take over the task – either based on price, experience, or reviews from previous collaborations.
HowItWorks.Step5: Evaluate the buyer: When the task is complete, you can evaluate the buyer and their service. This way, you help other companies on the platform make well-informed decisions about who they want to collaborate with in the future.
